items.summary: Ensure the entire "Add bench" flow is localized when opened (the modal opened from the Benches list "Add new" button), by replacing all user-facing strings in `frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/AddBenchModal.tsx` with `useI18n().t(...)` calls and adding any missing translation keys.

Add support for additional UI languages (Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Turkish) by extending `frontend/src/i18n/languages.ts` with language tags and display names, and extending `frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts` to include translation dictionaries for the new languages for all existing `TranslationKey` entries (plus any new keys added for the Add Bench modal).
